query: On what basis does the Commission come to the conclusion in its answer to written questions E-3972-3973/03 and E-4011-4014/03 OJ C of 25 February 2004 that the Bulgarian authorities are responsible for the delays and cancelled components of the civil society development project BG 0104.03, despite the fact that in Bulgaria it is claimed that final decisions on all matters are taken by the EU delegation?
